name: pulmonary embolism
description: Pulmonary embolism is the occlusion of a pulmonary artery or one of its branches, typically caused by thrombi that originate from the deep veins of the legs or other parts of the body, leading to impaired gas exchange and potential hemodynamic instability.

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Presence or absence of pulmonary embolism

values.name: indeterminate
values.description: Presence of pulmonary embolism cannot be determined

values.name: unknown
values.description: Presence of pulmonary embolism is unknown

attributes.name: change from prior
attributes.description: Whether and how a pulmonary embolism has changed over time
